3. Bob and Alice switch partners. This means Bob is now dancing with Patrick, and Alice is dancing with Rodrigo. Claire remains with Karl.
4. Alice and Claire switch partners. This means Alice is now dancing with Patrick, and Claire is dancing with Rodrigo. Bob remains with Karl.

At the end of the dance, Claire is dancing with (B) Rodrigo.
